attributes.action: Stop the unfair inheritance tax on British Farmers
attributes.additional_details:
Keir Stramer has told the British people they must choose between cutting NHS waiting times and taxing farmers more, But are we really stuck with this binary choice, ''I don't think so'' 

Why didn't Keir Starmer ask the British people to choose between taxing farmers more or Net Zero or African countries sustainability programs or Ukraine He didn't give these choices because he new what the British people would choose.
attributes.background: Stop the unfair inheritance tax on British Farmers and find the money the Government claim they need from other sources.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Don't change inheritance tax relief for working farms
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700138
